titles.title: Permanent Marriage Equity Act of 2007
To make permanent marriage penalty relief.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
1/4/2007--Introduced.
Permanent Marriage Equity Act of 2007 - Makes provisions of the Economic Growth and Tax Relief Reconciliation Act of 2001 that eliminate the marriage penalty in the standard deduction, the 15-percent tax bracket, and the earned income tax credit, permanent.
